location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J Stewart, Assistant at the Camp at Mahamrah, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from J Stewart, Assistant at the Camp at Mahamrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing an extract from the account of the mission in Persia, showing the amount of what was paid for two Dows to Shaik Jabara, the Shaik of Congoon [Kangan, India].
